entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump So advertised as a briefing with the "Coronavirus Task Force" turned out to be Trump & Pence show with 1 another guy speaking for approx 5.5 minutes out of 23 minutes. At least in this clip
